page.title: 02Housing In Skelton
page.content: . Skelton has a poulation of 1,500. Most of the people live on a new estate which was built about five years ago.The estate containe 250 dwellings.Most of the dwellings in the village are detached houses followed by terraced houses, semi-detached houses, semi-detached bugalows and bungalows.The figures for each house type are as follows:- Detached Houses 259 Semi-detached 98 Terraced 139 Bungalows 21 Semi-bungalows 27 Mansions 2 Total 546 The oldest dwellings in the village are situated around the green. There is also a council estate which was built after The Second World war in 1946.
